adverbs.description: incidentally (comparative more incidentally, superlative most incidentally)

entries.meaning: (manner) In an incidental manner; not of central or critical importance.
examples: The book discussed the subject, but only incidentally.

entries.meaning: By chance; in an unplanned way.
(speech act, conjunctive) Parenthetically, by the way.
examples: Incidentally, did you hear anything new from your brother yesterday?
